name: JwtBuilder
description: A representation that is used to create signed and encrypted JWTs

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: keyId
attributes.description: The id of the key that should be used to sign, encrypt the current data. If left empty the keyId from the header will be used instead as fallback. The keyId must match an existing alias within the application keystore

attributes.name: addX5Sha256tHeader
attributes.description: Tells if the SHA-256 of the certificate corresponding to the key used to sign the JWS should be added to the header

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: The header of the JWT that should be created

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The body of a plain JWT in case of a request and the JWT itself in case of response

attributes.name: jwt
attributes.description: The generated JWT in case of response or the JWT to be verified or decrypted in case of request
